mapper.select: select c.cityimg, city from product a join recommandProduct b on a.productnum = b.productnum join airport c on a.arrive = c.iata
select productCnt,city, cityimg from (select a.productCnt,b.city,b.cityimg from product a join airport b on a.arrive = b.iata order by a.productcnt desc) where rownum<=#{rownum}
select sale,city,cityimg from (select a.sale,b.city,b.cityimg from product a join airport b on a.arrive = b.iata order by a.sale desc) where rownum<=#{rownum}
